modName: Ultimate Hearthfire Gardens for Vanilla Homes
summary: Adds Hearthfire style plantable gardens outside all the vanilla Skyrim homes.
descriptionHtml:
Hearthfire added gardens to grow your own plants, but only on the Hearthfire homesteads. This mod adds planters and flowerpots outside the vanilla game homes so you can enjoy gardening without giving up the benefits of city life.

Planters will appear outside your home once a given upgrade is bought from the steward:

Breezehome - Loft Decorations
Honeyside - Garden
Vlindrel Hall - Entrance Hall
Hjerim - Living Room
Proudspire Manor - Porch Decorations

Requires Hearthfire.
author: QoolaidGaming Team

files.name: UltimateHearthfireGardensVanilla
files.changelogHtml:
Took over the mod with permission from original author.
Added planters to the porch in Produspire manor
Fixed an issue with a non-usable planter being seen in Riften before purchasing the garden.
